txt.en: Talk to King Thráin at Amdân
King Thráin can be found at Amdân.\n\nYou have slain many of the Orcs at Azanulbizar. You should talk to King Thráin.
'Hah! In time, the Orcs shall learn to fear our battle-cries as greatly as our axes!\n\n'Baruk Khazâd! Khazâd ai-mênu!'
Orcs can be found throughout Azanulbizar.\n\nKing Thráin has asked you to slay Orcs at Azanulbizar.

'It is not merely Azog who must be punished for the defilement of my father, Thrór. Every single Orc must be hunted down and driven from our lands of old.\n\n'Slay every Orc that you find, my friend, for each one that falls before us in battle brings this war closer to its end!'
The Haban'akkâ of Thráin struck fear into the hearts of the Orcs across Middle-earth.
